channel.title: VirtualBox on Machine Learning
channel.description: Recent content in VirtualBox on Machine Learning

item.title: VirtualBox Network and Skills
item.description: OBS: cloning a VM with the status of pause (not powered-off), it canNOT re-initialize the MAC address. Thus, it is necessary to disconnect the cable and poweroff to re-initialize the MAC and then boot. INSTALL ON UBUNTU # Tested on v18.04. sudo apt-get update && \ sudo apt-get -y install virtualbox (sometimes, maybe need to prepare the env before installation:) sudo apt-get update && \ sudo apt-get -y install gcc make linux-headers-$(uname -r) dkms && \ wget -q https://www.
